page.title: 03POPULATION IN DOBWALLS
page.content: DOBWALLS IS A SIZEABLE AND GROWING SETTLEMENT.IN NOV. 1985 IT HAD A POPULATION OF 1620.THERE IS PLANNING PERMISSION FOR A FURTHER 90 DWELLINGS GIVING AN ESTIMATED POPULATION FOR 1990 OF 1860. RETIRED PEOPLE USED TO MAKE UP THE MAJORITY OF THE INHABITANTS. THERE IS A COUNCIL SHELTERED HOUSING SCHEME, AND MANY PRIVATELY BUILT BUGALOWS. HOWEVER A NEW ESTATE, WHICH WHEN COMPLETED WILL CONTAIN 160 DWELLINGS, HAS THE FIRST TIME BUYER IN MIND. THERE ARE NOW MANY MORE FAMILLIES,MANY WITH SMALL CHILDREN. SUCH A SHIFT IN AGE STRUCTURE HAS PUT PRESSURE ON THE RESOURCES OF THE VILLAGE AND ALSO GIVEN HOPE FOR THE FUTURE.FOR SOME THOUGH, SUCH RADICAL CHANGES IN THE NATURE OF THEIR COMMUNITY RESULTS IN TENSIONS SIMILAR TO THOSE IN NEW TOWNS.
